# Introduction {.unnumbered}

Exponents let us write repeated multiplication more easily. In this unit, youâ€™ll learn the rules for working with exponents to simplify expressions.

## What Youâ€™ll Learn

- Multiply and divide expressions with exponents
- Apply exponent rules (no scientific notation)
- Understand zero and negative exponents
